name: Armentières
description:
"There is still a place in the line for YOU

 Will you fill it?"

Made for WeeklyGameJame (Week 133 - Wall Jump)

Game Mechanics
  • Armentiéres is a vertical platformer with wall jumping as its main mechanic.
  • Press or hold down spacebar while using movement keys to jump off vertical surfaces.
  • Avoid artillery shells, barbed wire and the creeping mustard gas from below.
  • The scroll on your back represents one of your two health points. Should you lose the scroll, you will get a slim opportunity to regain it as it falls from above.
  • Short tutorial included and recommended to get a feel for the wall jumping mechanics.
  • Single level game.
Controls
  • 'A' & 'D' to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • 'R' to respawn/restart
Sound

Music is an edited version of "It's a Long, Long Way to Tipperary" by American Quartet. (No Copyright under Public Domain Mark 1.0)

https://archive.org/details/ItsALongLongWayToTipperary/ItsALongLongWayToTipperary-NoiseRemoved.wav

https://www.zapsplat.com/
